entry.title: The Wild Boy
entry.summary:
Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,582Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 330

Summary: The 118 get a call to some nearby woodlands where the police are waiting for their assistance. Athena tells them that they need to help with a little boy that had gotten his leg stuck in a beartrap. All seems simple but then she tells them that the boy is a feral child, animalistic and frightened, and was throwing rocks at people who tried to get closer. Buck and Eddie are tasked to get him to safety.The boy is scared of everything around him, people, sounds, objects, the wind, the smells. Terror is all the boy knew until he found something he wasn’t scared of.And its name was Evan Buckley. :3Warnings - Heavy descriptions of medical trauma, child abuse, neglect and injury.Queue found family, Christopher being an amazing big brother and the 118 being the best family in the entire world. :3

entry.title: The first 24 hours
entry.summary:
Author: Eve_narlie_buddie

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,414Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 7

Summary: Buck patted Eddie’s back and tried to savour the last few moments he had with Eddie as much as he could. Closing his eyes he nestled his head and nose into the crook of Eddie’s neck, taking in Eddie’s scent for the last time. He could feel Eddie’s heart beating through his chest and was counting all the beats one, two, three, four. He wanted this moment to last forever, never wanting to part from Eddie. He knew it was unreasonable and Eddie had to go but it’s like there was an invisible string, pulling them towards each other, not letting up.

entry.title: If You Wanted, If You Asked
entry.summary:
Author: pretty_boy_buckley

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,665Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

Summary: “I’m your guy, Eddie,” he said simply, voice having gone quiet, shrugging. “I’m your partner. I have your back and I’m never leaving you— even if you're 800 miles away. You’ll never be alone, ever again,” Buck vowed. “I mean, I would–” He cut himself off again, dropping his gaze to his lap.“You would…?” Eddie finally spoke, his voice soft as he tried pulling the unspoken words from Buck.orBuck and Eddie get drunk and Buck makes sure Eddie knows he isn't alone.

entry.title: Interlude on I-10
entry.summary:
Author: Bookworm0303

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,578Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 300

Summary: Without waiting for a reaction or reply, the man bore down on the gas and peeled down the highway, leaving Buck stranded in the middle of nowhere somewhere along Interstate 10.And as Buck watched the red brake lights of his Jeep disappear into the distance, clutching his prescription of blood thinners tightly to his chest... there was really only one thing left to do. Tilting his head back until he was staring at the stars, he took a deep breath and screamed into the night: “Fuck!” And much like every other one of his recent cries for help, it had gone unanswered.---Buck gets carjacked, held at gunpoint, and stranded in Arizona the day before his first shift post-lawsuit. And that's only the beginning of his troubles.

entry.title: Fallen For You
entry.summary:
Author: littlebuddie26

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,034Chapters: 8/10Kudos: 262

Summary: His breaths are beginning to slow down, and the moments between closing and opening his eyes again are becoming longer and longer.The medic in him knows the importance of staying awake, but truthfully he knows he’s not going to make it out of this, so what’s the point.What was that thing Buck said to him before? It’s like the universe is screaming at you and you refuse to listen?Is this the universe’s way of screaming at him? He messed things up so badly with his own son and in his damn impulsive resolve to rush in and fix things with Chris, of fucking course he’s going to mess that up too.....Or, a Buddie NDE fic; A tree falls on Eddie's car on his drive to El Paso to get Chris, and Buck takes a (literal) bullet for Eddie when Charlie's mom (4x14) comes back for revenge, feat Coma Eddie and the will that needs to get brought up again. Set post Maddie-kidnapping, around the time of U-haul hug.

entry.title: No grave can hold my body down (I'll crawl home to you)
entry.summary:
Author: WhisperingHope

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,785Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 33

Summary: Evan Buckley has the worst luck. He knows it. His team knows it. Maddie dealt with it his entire upbringing. It’s become a simple fact of life. The sky is blue, grass is green, and Evan Buckley has god-awful luck. If a crushed leg (due to toppled fire truck), a pulmonary embolism at the ripe age of 27, being caught in a tsunami with his best friend’s son, and an honest to god lightning strike weren’t enough proof of the matter, stepping on a bomb is all the confirmation he really didn’t need.Edmundo Diaz has faced far too much death in his lifetime to be afraid of it. In fact, he’s spent most of his life staring down the barrel of a gun, metaphorically and physically. Quite honestly, Santa Muerte himself could appear before Eddie’s very eyes and he would just count it as another Tuesday. So being in close proximity to a live explosive? Not even the worst thing he’s had to deal with in recent years. Really, not even the worst thing he's had to deal with this week. But his best friend standing on the trigger? Eddie’s never been afraid of death. Until he found himself standing between it and his best friend.
